## Vector2.Dot() method

Gets the dot product of the vector "left" and the vector "right"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Dot(left: ReadOnlyVector2, right: ReadOnlyVector2): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines first vector |
|  right | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines second vector |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the dot product (float)
